entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:46 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
